backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to use a user-uploaded image in the success screen.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, global styles, Tailwind config, and an empty hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark mode settings defining global UI colors and layout behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main game component handling proposal/success views and dynamic No-button behavior with an updated success photo.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module placeholder for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Valentine‑themed Tailwind variables and background styling with a decorative pattern image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap wiring React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and Valentine color tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current Valentine mini‑game state, including feature descriptions, No-button behavior, conditional Yes message, required image assets, and known issues. Serves as the authoritative specification for UI flow and interactions.
